ere are the extracted triplets:

< Daisy Elizabeth Adams Lampkin
1:
--------------------
Text: Daisy Elizabeth Adams Lampkin:  Lampkin’s effective skills as an orator, fundraiser, organizer, and political activist guided the work being conducted by the [[National Association of Colored Women]] (NACW); [[National Association for the Advancement of Colored People]] (NAACP); [[National Council of Negro Women]] and other leading civil rights organizations of the [[Progressive Era]].
Triplets:<Daisy Elizabeth Adams Lampkin
